entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:13 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
